meanings.definition: A protein extract from the tuberculosis bacterium used in skin tests for tuberculosis infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor injected tuberculin into my skin to check for tuberculosis.
meanings.sent2: The nurse administered the tuberculin test to determine if I had tuberculosis.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the tuberculin injection made me feel like a human pincushion.
meanings.sent4: The tuberculin test was like a detective searching for clues in my body.
meanings.sent5: The tuberculin reaction on my skin was like a tiny alarm going off.
